innerText: 554.Jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti jāto hutvā saṃvaḍḍhito. Na sabbaso paccakkhā honti paricayābhāvato. Ciranikkhantoti nikkhanto hutvā cirakālo. Dandhāyitattanti vissajjane mandattaṃ saṇikavutti, taṃ pana saṃsayavasena cirāyanaṃ nāma hotīti āha ‘‘kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitatta’’nti. Vitthāyitattanti sārajjitattaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vitthāyitattaṃ nāma chambhitattanti adhippāyena ‘‘thaddhabhāvaggahaṇa’’nti vuttaṃ.

children: ti atthamāha. Upasaggavasena hi dhātu-saddā atthavisesavuttino honti yathā ‘‘uddharatū’’ti.
innerText: 555.U-iti upasaggayoge lumpa-saddo uddharaṇattho hotīti ‘‘ullumpatū’’ti padassa uddharatūti atthamāha. Upasaggavasena hi dhātu-saddā atthavisesavuttino honti yathā ‘‘uddharatū’’ti.
Brahmalokamaggadesanāvaṇṇanā

556. Yassa atisayena balaṃ atthi, so ‘‘balavā’’ti vuttoti āha ‘‘balasampanno’’ti. Saṅkhaṃ dhamayatīti saṅkhadhamako, taṃ dhamayitvā tato saddapavattako. Appanāva vaṭṭati paṭipakkhato sammadeva cetaso vimuttibhāvato.

children: pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato. Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā. Vuttavipariyāyato pana
tiādi. Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati, tathā disāpharaṇaṃ.
innerText: Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato. Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā. Vuttavipariyāyato pana appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacaraṃ, tenāha ‘‘tañhī’’tiādi. Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati, tathā disāpharaṇaṃ.

children: pana taṃ āgamanavasena labbhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Na hi brahmavihāranissando āruppaṃ, atha kho kasiṇanissando, tasmā yaṃ suvibhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ, taṃ
nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ, yañca brahmavihārasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāpannaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ, taṃ iminā
nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti apare. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
innerText: Keci pana taṃ āgamanavasena labbhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Na hi brahmavihāranissando āruppaṃ, atha kho kasiṇanissando, tasmā yaṃ suvibhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ, taṃ ‘‘appamāṇakata’’nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ, yañca brahmavihārasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāpannaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ, taṃ iminā pariyāyena pharaṇappamāṇavasena appamāṇakatanti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti apare. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.

children: ti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve na tiṭṭhati.
ti tassa sāmatthiyaṃ khepetvā. Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā attano vipākuppādananti āha
ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena mettādivihārī.
innerText: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammeti rūpāvacarakamme, arūpāvacarakamme ca sati. Na ohīyati na tiṭṭhatīti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve na tiṭṭhati. Laggitunti āvarituṃ nisedhetuṃ. Ṭhātunti paṭibalo hutvā ṭhātuṃ. Pharitvāti paṭippharitvā. Pariyādiyitvāti tassa sāmatthiyaṃ khepetvā. Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā attano vipākuppādananti āha ‘‘tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā’’tiādi. Evaṃ mettādivihārīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena mettādivihārī.

children: nti aggaññasutte āgatanayena upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
innerText: 559.Aggaññasutte…pe… alatthunti aggaññasutte āgatanayena upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
